channel.title: Looking for Host, Up To 40 USD Payment!
channel.description:
[b]Payments[/b]
16 Hours - 10 USD 20 Hours - 15 USD 24 Hours - 20 USD
16 Hours Hoster & Coder - 20 USD 20 Hours Hoster & Coder - 25 USD 24 Hours Hoster & Coder - 30 USD
Extremely Experienced Coder & Hoster - 40 USD
[b]The Server[/b]
Well, I would like you to use this server http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,100882.0.html, (if you can code, make a few changes et cetra).
If you can find a better server or one that you think is better, please use that.
Also, I'll only use trusted members to host the server, this is because I'm not risking loosing up to 40 USD.
Thanks, Kennetht04.
